channel.title: Tutorials on SPARC FAIR Codeathon
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on SPARC FAIR Codeathon

item.title: Tutorial 1: Mapping 2D data points to a 3D organ scaffhold
item.description: Before you start Please make sure you have followed the instruction in the Getting started page before selecting your tutorial. Mapping 2D data points to a 3D organ scaffhold The first Quilted Tutorial consists in mapping 2D data point to a 3D scaffhold. In your terminal, navigate to the tutorial-1 folder in the cloned directory and start JupyterLab: $ cd SPARC-tutorial/tutorial-1 && jupyter-lab --LabApp.token='' --no-browser Follow this link to get started and open the SPARC-tutorial.

item.title: Tutorial 2: Resampling dataset for simulations
item.description: Before you start Please make sure you have followed the instruction in the Getting started page before selecting your tutorial. Resampling dataset for simulations The second Quilted Tutorial consists in resampling some 2D data to prepare for simulations. In your terminal, navigate to the tutorial-2 folder in the cloned directory and start JupyterLab: $ cd SPARC-tutorial/tutorial-2 && jupyter-lab --LabApp.token='' --no-browser Follow this link to get started and open the SPARC-tutorial.ipynb file.
